description.value:
The Forgemarshal of Paradise is the preeminent master of artifice. One of the Empyreans, his works are of unparalleled quality.

Edicts: Improve your craft, serve your people, profit through honest work.

Anathema: Intentionally create inferior works, destroy creations without reason, fail to correct a critical error in a craft.

Areas of Concern: The forge, protection, art, and the pursuit of perfection.
